local::connect_pair

Create a pair of connected sockets. 

template<
    typename Protocol>
void connect_pair(
    basic_socket< Protocol > & socket1,
    basic_socket< Protocol > & socket2);
  » more...

template<
    typename Protocol>
void connect_pair(
    basic_socket< Protocol > & socket1,
    basic_socket< Protocol > & socket2,
    asio::error_code & ec);
